message:
Dear {{ doc.party_name }},

A payment of Rs. {{ frappe.utils.fmtmoney(doc.paid_amount) }} has been transferred to you as per the bank details provided by {{ doc.company }}.

For more information, please check the attachment.
name: Payout Processed
subject: Payment of Rs. {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.paid_amount) }} Transferred to You
